oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alvin C. York story -- Gracie Williams' home

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houses
Ganier, Albert Franklin, 1883-1973; York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Sergeant York (Motion picture); Fentress County (Tenn.); York, Gracie Loretta Williams, 1900-1984
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A small one-story frame home with a picket fence in front. Two unidentified men are behind and leaning on the fence. There are three very large trees in front of the fence. Another small home stands at a 45-degree angle behind and to the left of the forward-facing home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert F. Ganier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gracie Loretta Williams York's childhood home
